item.title: ‘NBA 2K26’: Here’s Where to Score the Game Online
item.description: Ahead of the 2025-26 NBA season, the latest “NBA 2K” is here! The newest entry in the gaming franchise is the biggest yet with all 30 NBA teams with superstar players, including LeBron Jam
